meanings.definition: To leave someone or something behind
meanings.sent1: She was abandoning her old toys in the attic.
meanings.sent2: The lost puppy was abandoning its search for its owner.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful wizard kept abandoning his wand in strange places.
meanings.sent4: The sailor felt like the sea was abandoning him in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The autumn wind was abandoning the leaves from the trees in a colorful dance.

meanings.definition: To give up on something or someone
meanings.sent1: He was abandoning his dream of becoming an astronaut.
meanings.sent2: The tired hiker was abandoning the idea of reaching the mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: The chef was abandoning the recipe and decided to cook without it.
meanings.sent4: The student felt like abandoning the difficult math problem was the only option.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was abandoning the idea of growing roses and switched to sunflowers instead.

meanings.definition: To desert or forsake someone or something
meanings.sent1: The soldier was abandoning his post in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent2: The explorer was abandoning his companion in the dense jungle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat kept abandoning its toy mouse under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The old house felt like its owners were abandoning it to decay.
meanings.sent5: The tired traveler was abandoning the idea of finding a comfortable bed for the night.
